author: Sarah Perez
title: Houseparty reports 50M sign-ups in past month amid COVID-19 lockdowns
description: Houseparty, the popular video chat application acquired by Fortnite maker Epic Games in 2019, has seen massive growth due to the COVID-19 pandemic. With government lockdowns keeping people from being able to visit friends and other loved ones in person, consu…
